Title: Expands the definition of pesticide to include seeds that have been coated or treated with an insecticide
Summary: Expands the definition of "pesticide" to include seeds that have been coated or treated with an insecticide.
LawCode: Amd ยง33-0101, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to expanding the definition of "pesticide" to include seeds that have been coated or treated with an insecticide
